title: Now You Tell One (Charles R. Bowers, 1926)
description:
Now You Tell One (1926)

The Liars Club is holding their contest to see who can tell the most unbelievable story, with a gold medallion waiting to be awarded to the winner. Disappointed with the other members&#039; bland efforts, one member brings in Charley Bowers, who has an extraordinary tale to tell. Charley claims to have invented a magic potion that enables him to grow absolutely anything by a simple grafting process, and he proceeds to tell his story to the club. 
 - imdb

Directed by Charles R. Bowers

           Ted Sears
